fields.address: Arbeitslager Bei Krasnuzyn Kreis Krasnistaw, Lublin

fields.title: Liste Nr. 1
fields.description: List of Czechoslovakians deported to various camps and ghettos in Poland.  Includes name, previous permanent address, current place, and notes about transport.  The list has the following sections: THERESIENSTADT, Litzmannstadt, Izbica, Warschau, Lubartow, Kamionka bei Lubartow, Cholm bei Lublin, Krakau, verschiedene Orte
